title: The Summer Child
description: Kidnapped and brought to a land of eternal winter, Kyri of Summerland must find a way to survive. But can she abandon the people of Winter when only she holds the power to save them?Based on the myth of Persephone and Hades, this novella tells the story of a maiden grown into womanhood, who must sacrifice herself for love before finding her true power.
author: Lee Savino
